text: A Local Government Area (LGA) is an administrative division of a country. A local government is responsible for it."Local Government Areas of Australia" at Princeton.edu ; retrieved 2013-4-25. Its size varies by country but it is generally a subdivision of a state, province, or territory. LGA is used as a general description in many places, including Australia, Gambia "Gambia" at CityPopulation.de; retrieved 2013-4-25. and Nigeria. "Nigeria: Administrative Division" at CityPopulation.de; retrieved 2013-4-25. ==Related pages== * Municipal corporation * County ==References== Category:Local government
title: Local Government Area
